sentence.text: Depletion of the exon 3-containing long isoform of mitochondrial translational elongation (MRPL33-L) led to impaired proliferation and increased apoptosis in cancer cell lines and in a xenograft model.

In summary, our findings underscore the biological significance of mitochondrial translational elongation-L and hnRNPK in the tumor formation and identifies hnRNPK as a critical splicing regulator of MRPL33 pre-mRNA in cancer cells
